participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, always eager to make new connections.
participant_1.background: Emma grew up in a small town and has a degree in communications. She enjoys meeting new people and is passionate about social causes.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and analytical, often approaches conversations with a sense of curiosity.
participant_2.background: Liam is a software engineer from a metropolitan area. He has a keen interest in technology and often participates in local meetups.
